# collisionMode

**Instance Property**

The collision mode to use when interpreting the collision frame rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var collisionMode: MKAnnotationView.CollisionMode { get set }
```

## Managing collisions between annotation views

- **MKAnnotationView.CollisionMode**: Constants that indicates how to interpret the collision frame rectangle of an annotation view.
